price: Mu vy’ukuri, abakorera inteba ishushe abakenyezi bubatse izabo ata n’ico binona, abemeramanakazi batigera biyumvira na rimwe ko bosambana, mu kubagiriza icaha c’ubusambanyi, baravumwe n’Imana Allah kw’isi no mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa, barategekanirijwe n’ibihano rutura mu muriro wa Jahannamu ku musi w’izuka[7];
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَرۡمُونَ ٱلۡمُحۡصَنَٰتِ ٱلۡغَٰفِلَٰتِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ لُعِنُواْ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٞ
footnotes: [7] Iyi Aayah, ni icemezo c’uko uwututse uwundi canke akambika ibara umwe mu bakenyezi b’Intumwa y’Imana (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah) aba agararije.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna yarmūna al-muḥ'ṣanāti al-ghāfilāti al-mu'mināti luʿinū fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati walahum ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
